name: Slightly Magic - 8bit Legacy Edition
description: The popular 1990's arcade adventure Slightly Magic has been remastered and restored by the original author/programmer Colin Jones. Combine objects with spells to activate, turn into a bird, a fish or even invisible!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows xp onwards Processor: 2GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware accelerated graphics with dedicated memory Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: Supported
